interruptCommand

public void interruptCommand()
Description copied from class: GtpEngine
Callback for interrupting commands. This callback will be invoked if the special comment line "# interrupt" is received. It will be invoked from a different thread.

Overrides:
interruptCommand in class GtpEngine
